title: Neighborhood Party Ordeal
description: A Short Story of BDSM and Extreme Humiliation M/F Mathilde, a bright privileged young lawyer, runs afoul of her hard-partying neighbors and falls under the power of an odious man. Mick sees it as his job to teach Mathilde humility and so much more. He takes her nude and on his leash to an outdoor party to accomplish just that. +++ FOR MATURE AUDIENCES ONLY 18 YRS OR OLDER +++CAUTION: MATERIAL INCLUDES DOMINANCE AND SUBMISSION, ANAL, IMPREGNATION, GAPING, EXHIBITIONISM, PETPLAY, DEGRADATION KINK, DEHUMANIZATION, PRAISE KINK, VERBAL HUMILIATION, FILMING, AND MASOCHISM
author: Maeve Zaal
